name: Spider Honeymoon
description:
Walk, stick, and swing your way through two spider lover's honeymoon! Enjoy the delightful sounds and sights as you play. Very loving, and very wholesome.

Developer's Note: Only when your relationship is grounded can you understand your partner's perspective.

Controls:

  • A/D and Arrow Keys--Left/Right
  • Space--Switch Between Spiders
  • R--Restart the Level
  • N--Move on to the Next Level
  • Escape Key--Pause Menu
  • W/S and Arrow Keys--Length and Shorten Tethered String

Vaglo--Coder, Game Engineer; Valiarchon--Level Designer, Assemblist; Bleary_Deer--Musician, Artist, Sfx Designer
